snippet: In December, Gary Locke, the departing United States ambassador to China, made his fifth visit to his ancestral village, in a region that was once the main point of departure for immigrants to America.
abstract: In December, Gary Locke, the departing United States ambassador to China, made his fifth visit to his ancestral village, in a region that was once the main point of departure for immigrants to America.

headline.main: U.S. Ambassador Renews Ties to His Ancestral Village
